From space cameras to nuclear reactors to autonomous vehicles and sophisticated medical devices, QNX provides the foundation operating system that runs these systems. Position Summary As a member of the Core Networking Test team, the student position involves designing, implementing, and executing manual and automated Software testing on the Networking components. In this role, the student will learn about QNX Core OS technologies and different test strategies in depth and apply that knowledge to design tests for new features, test scripts, test automation, product verification and issue detection. Location: Ottawa, ON Length of Term: 4 Months You will: • Learn and design new manual test cases • Write test automation and run automation tests • Investigate issues found, report on the quality and performance of new software builds. • Verify fixes and implement test cases to automate the verification of issues. • Work directly with QNX software developers and testers who are industry experts on embedded systems software and technologies.
